description.value:
Fear, Psychic

Aura 5

At the start of Cyan's turn, any creature within the aura takes 10 psychic damage and slides 2 squares. In addition, creatures within the aura do not have line of sight or line of effect to anything outside it.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Poison

Standard

Reach 3

+27 vs AC; 2d6+7 damage, and ongoing 10 poison damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+27 vs AC; 1d12+7 damage.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When an adjacent enemy does not move on its turn, at-will

+27 vs Reflex; 2d10+7 damage, and the triggering enemy is knocked prone.

At-Will ✦ Charm, Gaze

Standard

Ranged 5

+27 vs Will; the target is dominated (save ends). Cyan can dominate only one creature at a time.

At-Will ✦ Charm, Gaze

Minor, At-Will

Ranged 10

+27 vs Will; the target slides 3 squares.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Poison, Psychic

Standard

Close blast 10

+27 vs Fortitude; 3d10+6 poison damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 psychic damage and a -2 penalty to Will defense (save ends both). Aftereffect: The target is weakened (save ends).

Encounter ✦ Poison, Psychic

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The dragon's breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it immediately.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +27 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of Cyan's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

HP 1070; Bloodied 535
Resist 30 poison 		Init +18 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 40Fort 35Ref 38Will 39
Speed 10, fly 14 (hover), overland flight 20
Ability ScoresStr 19 (+15)
Con 22 (+17)		Dex 24 (+18)
Int 28 (+20)		Wis 21 (+16)
Cha 26 (+19)
Languages Draconic, Elven
Alignment Evil
Skills Bluff +24, Diplomacy +24, Insight +21, Intimidate +24Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 26 | Insight 31
